title: Recommended Hotel in beijing
text:
We just got back from our trip in Beijing. And this is our review about Park Plaza Wangfujing.
My husband and I decided to stay at this hotel. We didn't expect much but what we've got is beyond our mind. The hotel decorated well and comfortable.
Very close to Subway Station & many restaurant nearby. Dadong famous roast duck restaurant just couple minutes walk. Starbucks just only 1min walk, right in front of the hotel. The shuttle bus to and from the airport just stops near this hotel.
The receptionist (Miranda) can speak english very well. And help us everything what we needed.
The room itself was very comfy, clean, and has a nice decoration. We love the design.
Overall we really satisfied with their service and accomodation during our stay. We definitely like to stay here again if we visit Beijing someday.
